content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":256672,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tメイド達がランスに捕獲される、８人揃った後","translatedEnglishLine":"After the maids are captured by Rance, when all eight have gathered."},{"lineNumber":256673,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tとんでもないレアイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"An extraordinary rare event."},{"lineNumber":256674,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城、ランスの僕として過ごすメイド達。","translatedEnglishLine":"At Rance Castle, the maids live serving as Rance's servants."},{"lineNumber":256675,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tある時、ランスとケッセルリンクの話になる","translatedEnglishLine":"One day, a conversation arises about Rance and Kesselring."},{"lineNumber":256676,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケッセルリンクを復活させて欲しい・・いずれなとその気のないランス","translatedEnglishLine":"They want Kesselring to be revived... but Rance has no intention of doing so anytime soon."},{"lineNumber":256677,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそんな時、ケッセルリンクがカラーと知る。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, it is discovered that Kesselring is from Cale."},{"lineNumber":256678,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカラーに男はいない、どうしてだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are no men in Cale; why is that?"},{"lineNumber":256679,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tあの方は女性を守る為に男に性転換をした。","translatedEnglishLine":"That person changed sex to male in order to protect women."},{"lineNumber":256680,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t女だったら復活させたのに・・とランス・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says, 'If she had been a woman, I would have revived her...'"},{"lineNumber":256681,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t復活したら、性転換前に戻っているかもしれませんよと誰か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says, 'If revived, she might return to her pre-sex change form.'"},{ "lineNumber":256682,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tよし、復活させようと決意　＝　安易な考えのランス君","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I've decided to revive her — the easily made decision of Rance."},{ "lineNumber":256683,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなんらかの儀式して復活させる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Perform some kind of ritual to resurrect her."},{ "lineNumber":256684,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケッセルリンクは蘇った、期待通り女の姿","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring was revived, appearing as a woman as expected."},{ "lineNumber":256685,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスに対して復活させてくれた事は感謝するが","translatedEnglishLine":"She expresses gratitude to Rance for reviving her,"},{ "lineNumber":256686,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすぐに男に性転換して女達を守ると宣言","translatedEnglishLine":"But immediately declares she will change back to male and protect the women."},{ "lineNumber":256687,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそれは駄目だとランス、女達を守るのは俺の役目だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says that’s not allowed; protecting the women is his role."},{ "lineNumber":256688,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tお前がそれを願うのなら、その立場を競ってまた戦う事になるだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"If you desire that, we will have to compete for that position and fight again."},{ "lineNumber":256689,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t・・・ランスとやら、お前は本当に女達を不幸にしないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"...Rance, are you truly not going to bring misfortune to the women?"},{ "lineNumber":256690,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもちろんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course not."},{ "lineNumber":256691,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t・・よかろう、少し様子を見させてもらう","translatedEnglishLine":"...Very well, I will observe for a while."},{ "lineNumber":256692,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだいたい、こんなノリでケッセルリンク女が仲間になる","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, with this sort of vibe, the female Kesselring becomes an ally."},{ "lineNumber":256693,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城のある日","translatedEnglishLine":"One day at Rance Castle."},{ "lineNumber":256694,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジュリア、ハニーキング両方が居る時","translatedEnglishLine":"When both Julia and the Honey King are present."},{ "lineNumber":256695,"originalJapaneseLine":"城の中で偉そうにしているハニー達、ハニーキングが歩いているとジュリアと出会う","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honeys acting arrogantly inside the castle, the Honey King meets Julia while walking."},{ "lineNumber":256696,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し話、そのバカっぷりにいたく感動するハニーキング","translatedEnglishLine":"After a little talk, the Honey King is deeply impressed by her foolishness."},{ "lineNumber":256697,"originalJapaneseLine":"君は逸材だ、改造してやろう。もっと強くなれるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You are a rare talent; I’ll modify you. You can become stronger."},{ "lineNumber":256698,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに言う、２．３日私に預けたたまえ。","translatedEnglishLine":"He tells Rance, 'Leave her with me for two or three days.'"},{ "lineNumber":256699,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、前にもこんな事があったような・・なかったような・・ま、いいかジュリアだし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, something like this happened before... or maybe not... well, it's Julia, so whatever."},{ "lineNumber":256700,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{ "lineNumber":256701,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして・・２．３日後","translatedEnglishLine":"And then... two or three days later."},{ "lineNumber":256702,"originalJapaneseLine":"眼鏡をかけたジュリアが現れた、目が悪くなったの・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Julia appears wearing glasses—her eyesight has gotten worse..."},{ "lineNumber":256703,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん、改造して良くなったのでは無いのか、目が悪くなったのは改悪では・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh, wasn't the modification supposed to improve things? Her eyes worsening is a downgrade, isn't it?"},{ "lineNumber":256704,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーキング、眼鏡をつけたら可愛さ１００倍だ、わからんのか、愚かな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Honey King says, 'With glasses, her cuteness is multiplied by 100. Can't you see, you fool?'"},{ "lineNumber":256705,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは疑問には思うが、ま、いいか・・・ジュリアだしと深く考えない","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance wonders but thinks, well... it's Julia, so he doesn't think deeply about it."},{ "lineNumber":256706,"originalJapaneseLine":"チルディかレイラ、少し道場にきなさい、目が悪くなったのなら少し剣技に影響があるかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"To Tildir or Leila: come to the dojo for a moment; if your eyesight worsened, it might affect your sword skills a bit."},{ "lineNumber":256707,"originalJapaneseLine":"別にあなたには強さは求めてないけど、遠近感が狂った事で怪我したら困るからね、眼鏡を付けて戦っても","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not demanding strength from you, but if your sense of distance is off and you get injured, that would be bad, even if you fight wearing glasses."},{ "lineNumber":256708,"originalJapaneseLine":"怪我しないように最低限の練習してもらわないと","translatedEnglishLine":"You need to do some minimum practice to avoid injuries."},{ "lineNumber":256709,"originalJapaneseLine":"えー、練習やだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh— I don't want to practice."},{ "lineNumber":256710,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{ "lineNumber":256711,"originalJapaneseLine":"で、道場・・・　レイラもチルディもかなわない。","translatedEnglishLine":"So at the dojo... neither Leila nor Tildir can match up."},{ "lineNumber":256712,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょ、なにこれ・・どうしてそんなに強くなったの","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, what’s this... how did she become so strong?"},{ "lineNumber":256713,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、わかんない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I don't know."},{ "lineNumber":256714,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイラちゃん、チルディちゃんが弱くなったのじゃないの？","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't it that Leila and Tildir got weaker?"},{ "lineNumber":256715,"originalJapaneseLine":"てなノリで","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like that vibe."},{ "lineNumber":256716,"originalJapaneseLine":"拠点フェイズイベント、アーシー、ルーシー、マーシーが居る時","translatedEnglishLine":"A base phase event, when Arcy, Lucy, and Mercy are present."},{ "lineNumber":256717,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle."},{ "lineNumber":256718,"originalJapaneseLine":"３人がランス城の中で商売を始めた、占いだ、すごい的中するという事で人気","translatedEnglishLine":"The three started a business inside Rance Castle: fortune-telling, which is very popular for its accuracy."},{ "lineNumber":256719,"originalJapaneseLine":"多くの人が並んでいます","translatedEnglishLine":"Many people are lined up."},{ "lineNumber":256720,"originalJapaneseLine":"デパートの占いコーナーみたいに、３つのテントが立てられている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Like a mall’s fortune-telling corner, three tents have been set up."},{ "lineNumber":256721,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが説明、三姉妹は予知魔人バークスハムの使徒、すでにバークスハムは居ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone explains: the three sisters are disciples of the precognition demon Barksam, but Barksam is no longer here."},{ "lineNumber":256722,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎に殺されたとの事。","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, he was killed by Kentaro."},{ "lineNumber":256723,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様も何か占ってもらってはどうですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Would Lord Rance also like to have a fortune told?"},{ "lineNumber":256724,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだな・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then..."},{ "lineNumber":256725,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、アーシーの所に行こう","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let’s go to Arcy."},{ "lineNumber":256726,"originalJapaneseLine":"アーシーのテントに入ります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Entering Arcy’s tent."},{ "lineNumber":256727,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと会話。お菓子を渡す（ビスケッタさんから貰っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"A brief conversation. Handing over sweets (received from Ms. Biscetta)."},{"lineNumber":256728,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、では・・おにいちゃんが今、１番気になっている事を占うね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright then... I’ll tell you about the thing you’re most concerned about right now, big brother."},{"lineNumber":256729,"originalJapaneseLine":"残念です、おにいちゃんの希望はかないません。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m sorry, big brother, but your wishes will not come true."},{"lineNumber":256730,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだと・・て、なんの事だ？","translatedEnglishLine":"What... what do you mean?"},{"lineNumber":256731,"originalJapaneseLine":"私、アーシーが１０数年後に大きくなった時","translatedEnglishLine":"When I, Arcy, grow up in a dozen or so years..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド達がランスに捕獲される、８人揃った後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the maids are captured by Rance, when all eight have gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とんでもないレアイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An extraordinary rare event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、ランスの僕として過ごすメイド達。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance Castle, the maids live serving as Rance's servants.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある時、ランスとケッセルリンクの話になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day, a conversation arises about Rance and Kesselring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクを復活させて欲しい・・いずれなとその気のないランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They want Kesselring to be revived... but Rance has no intention of doing so anytime soon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな時、ケッセルリンクがカラーと知る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, it is discovered that Kesselring is from Cale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーに男はいない、どうしてだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are no men in Cale; why is that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの方は女性を守る為に男に性転換をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That person changed sex to male in order to protect women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女だったら復活させたのに・・とランス・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says, 'If she had been a woman, I would have revived her...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 復活したら、性転換前に戻っているかもしれませんよと誰か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, 'If revived, she might return to her pre-sex change form.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、復活させようと決意　＝　安易な考えのランス君
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I've decided to revive her — the easily made decision of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの儀式して復活させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perform some kind of ritual to resurrect her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは蘇った、期待通り女の姿
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kesselring was revived, appearing as a woman as expected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに対して復活させてくれた事は感謝するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She expresses gratitude to Rance for reviving her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに男に性転換して女達を守ると宣言
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But immediately declares she will change back to male and protect the women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは駄目だとランス、女達を守るのは俺の役目だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says that’s not allowed; protecting the women is his role.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前がそれを願うのなら、その立場を競ってまた戦う事になるだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you desire that, we will have to compete for that position and fight again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・ランスとやら、お前は本当に女達を不幸にしないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Rance, are you truly not going to bring misfortune to the women?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・よかろう、少し様子を見させてもらう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Very well, I will observe for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたい、こんなノリでケッセルリンク女が仲間になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, with this sort of vibe, the female Kesselring becomes an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城のある日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day at Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリア、ハニーキング両方が居る時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When both Julia and the Honey King are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の中で偉そうにしているハニー達、ハニーキングが歩いているとジュリアと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys acting arrogantly inside the castle, the Honey King meets Julia while walking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し話、そのバカっぷりにいたく感動するハニーキング
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a little talk, the Honey King is deeply impressed by her foolishness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君は逸材だ、改造してやろう。もっと強くなれるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are a rare talent; I’ll modify you. You can become stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに言う、２．３日私に預けたたまえ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He tells Rance, 'Leave her with me for two or three days.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、前にもこんな事があったような・・なかったような・・ま、いいかジュリアだし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, something like this happened before... or maybe not... well, it's Julia, so whatever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして・・２．３日後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then... two or three days later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼鏡をかけたジュリアが現れた、目が悪くなったの・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia appears wearing glasses—her eyesight has gotten worse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、改造して良くなったのでは無いのか、目が悪くなったのは改悪では・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh, wasn't the modification supposed to improve things? Her eyes worsening is a downgrade, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキング、眼鏡をつけたら可愛さ１００倍だ、わからんのか、愚かな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honey King says, 'With glasses, her cuteness is multiplied by 100. Can't you see, you fool?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは疑問には思うが、ま、いいか・・・ジュリアだしと深く考えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance wonders but thinks, well... it's Julia, so he doesn't think deeply about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チルディかレイラ、少し道場にきなさい、目が悪くなったのなら少し剣技に影響があるかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Tildir or Leila: come to the dojo for a moment; if your eyesight worsened, it might affect your sword skills a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にあなたには強さは求めてないけど、遠近感が狂った事で怪我したら困るからね、眼鏡を付けて戦っても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not demanding strength from you, but if your sense of distance is off and you get injured, that would be bad, even if you fight wearing glasses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪我しないように最低限の練習してもらわないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You need to do some minimum practice to avoid injuries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えー、練習やだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh— I don't want to practice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、道場・・・　レイラもチルディもかなわない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So at the dojo... neither Leila nor Tildir can match up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょ、なにこれ・・どうしてそんなに強くなったの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, what’s this... how did she become so strong?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、わかんない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I don't know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラちゃん、チルディちゃんが弱くなったのじゃないの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it that Leila and Tildir got weaker?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てなノリで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拠点フェイズイベント、アーシー、ルーシー、マーシーが居る時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A base phase event, when Arcy, Lucy, and Mercy are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３人がランス城の中で商売を始めた、占いだ、すごい的中するという事で人気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The three started a business inside Rance Castle: fortune-telling, which is very popular for its accuracy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの人が並んでいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many people are lined up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デパートの占いコーナーみたいに、３つのテントが立てられている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like a mall’s fortune-telling corner, three tents have been set up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが説明、三姉妹は予知魔人バークスハムの使徒、すでにバークスハムは居ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone explains: the three sisters are disciples of the precognition demon Barksam, but Barksam is no longer here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎に殺されたとの事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, he was killed by Kentaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様も何か占ってもらってはどうですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Would Lord Rance also like to have a fortune told?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、アーシーの所に行こう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let’s go to Arcy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アーシーのテントに入ります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entering Arcy’s tent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと会話。お菓子を渡す（ビスケッタさんから貰っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A brief conversation. Handing over sweets (received from Ms. Biscetta).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では・・おにいちゃんが今、１番気になっている事を占うね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright then... I’ll tell you about the thing you’re most concerned about right now, big brother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念です、おにいちゃんの希望はかないません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m sorry, big brother, but your wishes will not come true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと・・て、なんの事だ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... what do you mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、アーシーが１０数年後に大きくなった時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I, Arcy, grow up in a dozen or so years...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

why is that?"},{"lineNumber":256679,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tあの方は女性を守る為に男に性転換をした。","translatedEnglishLine":"That person changed sex to male in order to protect women."},{"lineNumber":256680,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t女だったら復活させたのに・・とランス・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says, 'If she had been a woman, I would have revived her...'"},{"lineNumber":256681,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t復活したら、性転換前に戻っているかもしれませんよと誰か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says, 'If revived, she might return to her pre-sex change form.'"},{ "lineNumber":256682,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tよし、復活させようと決意　＝　安易な考えのランス君","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I've decided to revive her — the easily made decision of Rance."},{ "lineNumber":256683,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなんらかの儀式して復活させる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Perform some kind of ritual to resurrect her."},{ "lineNumber":256684,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケッセルリンクは蘇った、期待通り女の姿","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring was revived, appearing as a woman as expected."},{ "lineNumber":256685,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスに対して復活させてくれた事は感謝するが","translatedEnglishLine":"She expresses gratitude to Rance for reviving her,"},{ "lineNumber":256686,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすぐに男に性転換して女達を守ると宣言","translatedEnglishLine":"But immediately declares she will change back to male and protect the women."},{ "lineNumber":256687,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそれは駄目だとランス、女達を守るのは俺の役目だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says that’s not allowed; protecting the women is his role."},{ "lineNumber":256688,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tお前がそれを願うのなら、その立場を競ってまた戦う事になるだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"If you desire that, we will have to compete for that position and fight again."},{ "lineNumber":256689,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t・・・ランスとやら、お前は本当に女達を不幸にしないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"...Rance, are you truly not going to bring misfortune to the women?"},{ "lineNumber":256690,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもちろんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course not."},{ "lineNumber":256691,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t・・よかろう、少し様子を見させてもらう","translatedEnglishLine":"...Very well, I will observe for a while."},{ "lineNumber":256692,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだいたい、こんなノリでケッセルリンク女が仲間になる","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, with this sort of vibe, the female Kesselring becomes an ally."},{ "lineNumber":256693,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城のある日","translatedEnglishLine":"One day at Rance Castle."},{ "lineNumber":256694,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジュリア、ハニーキング両方が居る時","translatedEnglishLine":"When both Julia and the Honey King are present."},{ "lineNumber":256695,"originalJapaneseLine":"城の中で偉そうにしているハニー達、ハニーキングが歩いているとジュリアと出会う","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honeys acting arrogantly inside the castle, the Honey King meets Julia while walking."},{ "lineNumber":256696,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し話、そのバカっぷりにいたく感動するハニーキング","translatedEnglishLine":"After a little talk, the Honey King is deeply impressed by her foolishness."},{ "lineNumber":256697,"originalJapaneseLine":"君は逸材だ、改造してやろう。もっと強くなれるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You are a rare talent; I’ll modify you. You can become stronger."},{ "lineNumber":256698,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに言う、２．３日私に預けたたまえ。","translatedEnglishLine":"He tells Rance, 'Leave her with me for two or three days.'"},{ "lineNumber":256699,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、前にもこんな事があったような・・なかったような・・ま、いいかジュリアだし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, something like this happened before... or maybe not... well, it's Julia, so whatever."},{ "lineNumber":256700,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{ "lineNumber":256701,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして・・２．３日後","translatedEnglishLine":"And then... two or three days later."},{ "lineNumber":256702,"originalJapaneseLine":"眼鏡をかけたジュリアが現れた、目が悪くなったの・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Julia appears wearing glasses—her eyesight has gotten worse..."},{ "lineNumber":256703,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん、改造して良くなったのでは無いのか、目が悪くなったのは改悪では・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh, wasn't the modification supposed to improve things? Her eyes worsening is a downgrade, isn't it?"},{ "lineNumber":256704,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーキング、眼鏡をつけたら可愛さ１００倍だ、わからんのか、愚かな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Honey King says, 'With glasses, her cuteness is multiplied by 100. Can't you see, you fool?'"},{ "lineNumber":256705,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは疑問には思うが、ま、いいか・・・ジュリアだしと深く考えない","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance wonders but thinks, well... it's Julia, so he doesn't think deeply about it."},{ "lineNumber":256706,"originalJapaneseLine":"チルディかレイラ、少し道場にきなさい、目が悪くなったのなら少し剣技に影響があるかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"To Tildir or Leila: come to the dojo for a moment; if your eyesight worsened, it might affect your sword skills a bit."},{ "lineNumber":256707,"originalJapaneseLine":"別にあなたには強さは求めてないけど、遠近感が狂った事で怪我したら困るからね、眼鏡を付けて戦っても","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not demanding strength from you, but if your sense of distance is off and you get injured, that would be bad, even if you fight wearing glasses."},{ "lineNumber":256713,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、わかんない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I don't know."},{ "lineNumber":256714,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイラちゃん、チルディちゃんが弱くなったのじゃないの？","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't it that Leila and Tildir got weaker?"},{ "lineNumber":256715,"originalJapaneseLine":"てなノリで","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like that vibe."},{ translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド達がランスに捕獲される、８人揃った後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the maids are captured by Rance, when all eight have gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とんでもないレアイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An extraordinary rare event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、ランスの僕として過ごすメイド達。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance Castle, the maids live serving as Rance's servants.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある時、ランスとケッセルリンクの話になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day, a conversation arises about Rance and Kesselring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクを復活させて欲しい・・いずれなとその気のないランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They want Kesselring to be revived... but Rance has no intention of doing so anytime soon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな時、ケッセルリンクがカラーと知る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, it is discovered that Kesselring is from Cale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーに男はいない、どうしてだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are no men in Cale; why is that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの方は女性を守る為に男に性転換をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That person changed sex to male in order to protect women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女だったら復活させたのに・・とランス・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says, 'If she had been a woman, I would have revived her...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 復活したら、性転換前に戻っているかもしれませんよと誰か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, 'If revived, she might return to her pre-sex change form.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、復活させようと決意　＝　安易な考えのランス君
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I've decided to revive her — the easily made decision of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの儀式して復活させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perform some kind of ritual to resurrect her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは蘇った、期待通り女の姿
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kesselring was revived, appearing as a woman as expected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに対して復活させてくれた事は感謝するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She expresses gratitude to Rance for reviving her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに男に性転換して女達を守ると宣言
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But immediately declares she will change back to male and protect the women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは駄目だとランス、女達を守るのは俺の役目だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says that’s not allowed; protecting the women is his role.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前がそれを願うのなら、その立場を競ってまた戦う事になるだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you desire that, we will have to compete for that position and fight again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・ランスとやら、お前は本当に女達を不幸にしないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Rance, are you truly not going to bring misfortune to the women?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・よかろう、少し様子を見させてもらう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Very well, I will observe for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたい、こんなノリでケッセルリンク女が仲間になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, with this sort of vibe, the female Kesselring becomes an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城のある日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day at Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリア、ハニーキング両方が居る時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When both Julia and the Honey King are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の中で偉そうにしているハニー達、ハニーキングが歩いているとジュリアと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys acting arrogantly inside the castle, the Honey King meets Julia while walking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し話、そのバカっぷりにいたく感動するハニーキング
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a little talk, the Honey King is deeply impressed by her foolishness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君は逸材だ、改造してやろう。もっと強くなれるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are a rare talent; I’ll modify you. You can become stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに言う、２．３日私に預けたたまえ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He tells Rance, 'Leave her with me for two or three days.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、前にもこんな事があったような・・なかったような・・ま、いいかジュリアだし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, something like this happened before... or maybe not... well, it's Julia, so whatever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして・・２．３日後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then... two or three days later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼鏡をかけたジュリアが現れた、目が悪くなったの・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia appears wearing glasses—her eyesight has gotten worse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、改造して良くなったのでは無いのか、目が悪くなったのは改悪では・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh, wasn't the modification supposed to improve things? Her eyes worsening is a downgrade, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキング、眼鏡をつけたら可愛さ１００倍だ、わからんのか、愚かな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honey King says, 'With glasses, her cuteness is multiplied by 100. Can't you see, you fool?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは疑問には思うが、ま、いいか・・・ジュリアだしと深く考えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance wonders but thinks, well... it's Julia, so he doesn't think deeply about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チルディかレイラ、少し道場にきなさい、目が悪くなったのなら少し剣技に影響があるかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Tildir or Leila: come to the dojo for a moment; if your eyesight worsened, it might affect your sword skills a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にあなたには強さは求めてないけど、遠近感が狂った事で怪我したら困るからね、眼鏡を付けて戦っても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not demanding strength from you, but if your sense of distance is off and you get injured, that would be bad, even if you fight wearing glasses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪我しないように最低限の練習してもらわないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You need to do some minimum practice to avoid injuries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えー、練習やだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh— I don't want to practice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、道場・・・　レイラもチルディもかなわない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So at the dojo... neither Leila nor Tildir can match up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょ、なにこれ・・どうしてそんなに強くなったの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, what’s this... how did she become so strong?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、わかんない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I don't know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラちゃん、チルディちゃんが弱くなったのじゃないの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't it that Leila and Tildir got weaker?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てなノリで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拠点フェイズイベント、アーシー、ルーシー、マーシーが居る時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A base phase event, when Arcy, Lucy, and Mercy are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３人がランス城の中で商売を始めた、占いだ、すごい的中するという事で人気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The three started a business inside Rance Castle: fortune-telling, which is very popular for its accuracy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの人が並んでいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many people are lined up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デパートの占いコーナーみたいに、３つのテントが立てられている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like a mall’s fortune-telling corner, three tents have been set up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが説明、三姉妹は予知魔人バークスハムの使徒、すでにバークスハムは居ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone explains: the three sisters are disciples of the precognition demon Barksam, but Barksam is no longer here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎に殺されたとの事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, he was killed by Kentaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様も何か占ってもらってはどうですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Would Lord Rance also like to have a fortune told?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、アーシーの所に行こう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let’s go to Arcy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アーシーのテントに入ります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entering Arcy’s tent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと会話。お菓子を渡す（ビスケッタさんから貰っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A brief conversation. Handing over sweets (received from Ms. Biscetta).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では・・おにいちゃんが今、１番気になっている事を占うね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright then... I’ll tell you about the thing you’re most concerned about right now, big brother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念です、おにいちゃんの希望はかないません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m sorry, big brother, but your wishes will not come true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと・・て、なんの事だ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... what do you mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、アーシーが１０数年後に大きくなった時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I, Arcy, grow up in a dozen or so years...
